Description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

SegName: Beginning Segment for Transportation Carrier Shipment Status Message
Description: To transmit identifying numbers and other basic data relating to the transaction set
To specify instructions in this business relationship or a reference number
To indicate identifying marks and numbers for shipping containers
To transmit information in a free-form format for comment or special instruction

SegName: Name and Address of key parties.

Description: To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code
To specify additional names or those longer than 35 characters in length
To specify the location of the named party
To specify the geographic place of the named party
To identify a person or office to whom communications should be directed
To specify pertinent dates and times
Remarks: Status and appointment dates and times shall not be transmitted in the G62 segment.

Description: To specify instructions in this business relationship or a reference number
To identify the interline carrier and relevant data
To reference a line number in a transaction set

SegName: Actual Status Code, Date, and Location.

Description: To specify the status of a shipment, the reason for that status, the date and time of the status and the date and time of any appointments scheduled.

SegName: Equipment, Shipment, or Real Property Location
Description: To specify the location of a piece of equipment, a shipment, or real property in terms of city and state or longitude and latitude

SegName: Equipment or Container Owner and Type
Description: To specify the owner, the identification number assigned by that owner, and the type of equipment
To specify instructions in this business relationship or a reference number
To indicate identifying marks and numbers for shipping containers
To specify the status of the shipment in terms of lading exception information
To transmit information in a free-form format for comment or special instruction
To identify Bill of Lading handling and service requirements

SegName: Shipment Weight, Packaging and Quantity Data
Description: To specify shipment details in terms of weight, and quantity of handling units
To transmit identifying codes, weights, and other related information related to an individual carton (package)
Remarks: Loops 0210, 0215 and 0220 shall be used in conjunction with loop 0200 to convey status for small package carrier shipments.

Description: To specify instructions in this business relationship or a reference number

SegName: Provides status specifically for the individual carton rather than the whole shipmen

To supply the full name of an individual or organizational entity
To specify the status of the shipment in terms of lading exception information

SegName: Shipment Weight, Packaging and Quantity Data
Description: To specify shipment details in terms of weight, and quantity of handling units
To indicate identifying marks and numbers for shipping containers

To transfer binary data in a single data segment and allow identification of the end of the data segment through a count; there is no identification of the internal structure of the binary data in this segment
